name: Side-tective
description:
When 6 sidekicks are participating in a reality show, a horrible murder happens. It's up to you to figure out who committed the crime, the murder weapon and the one framed in this detective-style game!

Q8 Game Jam Team

- Ahmad AlAtiya - Ideation

- Dunya - Music/Ideation

- Khaled - Consultancy

- Mohamed Sarwat - Game Engine/Art

- Pedro - Ideation/Logic
